actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill conferring jurisdiction upon the United States Court of Claims to hear, determine, and render judgement upon the claim of James W. Brundage.

summary.text: Waives the statute of limitations and all other bars to a suit brought against the United States by a named individual arising out of his claim for retroactive duty pay and allowances and retirement pay for service in the Department of the Air Force.

titles.title: A bill conferring jurisdiction upon the United States Court of Claims to hear, determine, and render judgement upon the claim of James W. Brundage.
